IndexPage.about: I’ve been working as a Web Developer since 2021 and I’m currently a Front-End Developer at Juntos Somos Mais.

contributions.1: Continuous contributions to the e-commerce platform and loyalty program, adding value to the end user.
contributions.2: Front-end lead for Obra Premiada 2024, ensuring UI implementation and integrations, while also aligning front-end with product and UI/UX.
contributions.3: Work on the open-source Atomium Design System, prioritizing tasks, developing components, fixing bugs, and reviewing PRs.
contributions.4: Redesigned the front-end engineering team's documentation process.
contributions.5: Reduced technical debt through refactoring, optimizations, security fixes, and performance improvements, such as handling chunk errors.
contributions.6: Collaboration with product, UI/UX, and engineering teams to align technical solutions with business objectives and the design system.
